keyMoments.title: Dr. Kureha's Silhouette
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kureha is introduced in silhouette at Drum Castle. She is revealed to be the island's only remaining doctor, living in the abandoned royal castle atop the Drum Rockies.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of one of the arc's most important characters. Kureha will become Chopper's mentor and plays a crucial role in saving Nami's life.

reveals.information: The only doctor remaining on Drum Island
Lives at Drum Castle atop the Drum Rockies
Known as 'the witch' by the island's residents

keyMoments.title: Negikuma Maria's Debut
keyMoments.description: Negikuma Maria appears in Bighorn village carrying onions to bake a cake for her eldest son's birthday. She represents the everyday citizens of Drum Island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the daily life of Drum Island residents and their resilience despite the island's hardships.

reveals.information: Resident of Bighorn village on Drum Island

keyMoments.title: Luffy Learns Restraint from Vivi
keyMoments.description: After Vivi is shot, Luffy is about to retaliate but Vivi stops him, teaching him that not all problems require violence. Luffy listens and apologizes to the villagers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's growth as a captain and his respect for Vivi's wisdom and diplomatic approach.

keyMoments.title: Decision to Climb the Mountain
keyMoments.description: Luffy makes the bold decision to climb the treacherous Drum Rockies while carrying the unconscious Nami on his back, despite the extreme danger.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's unwavering commitment to his crew and foreshadows one of the arc's most iconic moments.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to climb the mountain while carrying her.

keyMoments.title: Vivi Teaches Luffy About Diplomacy
keyMoments.description: After being shot by a frightened villager, Vivi immediately stops Luffy from retaliating, demonstrating her diplomatic nature and teaching Luffy an important lesson about restraint.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Vivi's role as a voice of reason and her positive influence on the crew's development.
keyMoments.quote: Not everything needs to be resolved with fighting!

keyMoments.title: Dalton Reveals Drum Island's History
keyMoments.description: Dalton explains to the crew how Drum Island was once a prosperous medical nation before King Wapol's tyranny destroyed it.
keyMoments.significance: Provides essential backstory for understanding the arc and establishes Dalton as a knowledgeable guide.
keyMoments.quote: This island used to have plenty of doctors... but that all changed.

keyMoments.title: First Mention of Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Dalton reveals that the Blackbeard Pirates attacked Drum Island five months ago, causing King Wapol to flee with all the doctors.
keyMoments.significance: Historic moment in the series - the first mention of one of the most important antagonists in One Piece.
keyMoments.quote: The captain of the crew called himself 'Blackbeard.'

reveals.information: Captain of the security squad of Drum Island

keyMoments.title: Nami's Life-Threatening Fever
keyMoments.description: Nami's fever reaches 42°C (107.6°F), a life-threatening temperature that drives Luffy's desperate decision to climb the mountain.
keyMoments.significance: Creates the central conflict of the arc and demonstrates the severity of her illness from the previous arc.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Volunteers to Accompany Luffy
keyMoments.description: Sanji decides to accompany Luffy on the dangerous climb up the Drum Rockies to help save Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's dedication to Nami and his loyalty to the crew.

keyMoments.title: Learning About Drum Island's Past
keyMoments.description: Along with Vivi, Usopp learns about Drum Island's tragic history from Dalton.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for understanding the island and its people.
